instructionsFor.edit: Edit 1439563175.000062: Finds the message in the public room with this timestamp, and changes its text to this message.
instructionsFor.delete: Delete 1439563175.000062: Finds the message in the public room with this timestamp, and deletes it.
instructionsFor.anon: Anon: Sends an anonymous message to the group.
instructionsFor.instructors: Instructors: Sends a *not* anonymous *private* message to each of the instructors. Mentioning *@instructors* in the main group does the same.

blurbs.hello:
Hi there! Give me commands by direct messaging me with the command followed by ':'. For example, to see the 'help' menu, you'd direct message me with:

Help:
blurbs.atmention: @mentioning me doesn't do anything. Please direct message me!
